description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for managing locations and time slots within a manager flow of a healthy meal ordering platform. It includes a main StatelessWidget 'ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen' with a scaffold and placeholder UI elements, as well as auxiliary widgets for header and row display.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget for managing locations and time slots, providing a scaffold with header and list items.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: Private widget for rendering the section header with themed gradient and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Private widget for rendering individual list items with icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the main screen, including app bar and list view.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for the section header, styled with a gradient background and icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI for individual row items in the list, with styling and icon.
